markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Sewer Gas](/Rules.aspx?ID=626)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 516 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Sewer gas often contains pockets of highly flammable gas. A pocket of sewer gas exposed to a source of flame explodes, dealing moderate environmental fire damage to creatures in the area.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Sewer Gas
search_markdown:
<additional-info>

</additional-info>
